What she likes best about Pro Mujer is the opportunity for health services and the possibility of saving money. 

The woman of the “Libertad” communal bank are shown in the photo during a meeting that they attend.

loans.use: To purchase belts

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es:
Eulalia es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista I”  ubicado en el distrito Puno,  provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 02 hijos.  Tiene estudios de educación secundaria.

Viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos desde hace 08 años, su   primer préstamo  fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  utilizó para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de golosinas y galletas.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es progresar en su negocio y que sus hijos sean profesionales.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Eulalia is a member of the community bank "Bellavista I," which is located in the district, province, and department of Puno. She is 35 years old, is married, and has two children. She has some secondary education.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 8 years. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, and she used the money to increase the working capital of her business. She sells candy and crackers.

She is applying for a new loan for the sum of 800 PEN, which she will invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business.

Her dream for the future is to make progress in her business and for her children to have careers.

What she likes most about her community bank is the ease of obtaining loans.

loans.use: Buy candy and crackers wholesale

loans.name: Maritza Elena

texts.es: Maritza Elena tiene 55 años, la actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de comida.  Esta no es la primera que realiza financiamientos, por lo que siempre ha demostrado pagar sus cuotas en tiempo y forma. Todos los días elabora y vende comida de día y por las noches ella busca la forma de sacar adelante a su familia. Hace más de 21 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y disfruta de obtener este medio de vida.
texts.en: Maritza Elena is 55 years old. She works as a food vendor. This is not the first time she has taken out a loan, and has always demonstrated her ability to pay her installments on time. Every day Maritza Elena makes and sells food during the day and at night she looks for other ways for her family to get ahead. She has been dedicated to this business for over 21 years. She is a very hardworking person and enjoys this doing this for a living.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Consuelo Balvina

texts.es:
La Señora. Consuelo M. es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive en la comunidad que lleva el mismo nombre y  pertenece a la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía, también tiene 4 ríos los mismos que  bañan a la ciudad.

La Señora. Consuelo es madre soltera de 2 hijos  que ya son mayores de edad y están  casados, vive con su hija que tiene 30 años, la misma que tiene dos hijos de 6 y 3 años de edad, con el trabajo y esfuerzo ha logrado construir su casa propia.

Doña Consuelo se dedica a la venta de animales pequeños, actividad que desempeña hace 10 años y ha aprendido este negocio gracias a su madre quien labora en esta actividad.

Es el segundo crédito que realiza y le gusta por que para recibir un crédito no necesita muchos papeleos,  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de unas vacas para su negocio. Su meta es tener mas ganado para la venta y así ir creciendo mucho más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Ms. Consuelo M. is a member of the El Aguacate Comunal Bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca within a community of the same name. This is a beautiful city due to its culture and traditions. It is home to a variety of cuisines and also has four rivers that bathe the city.

Consuelo is the mother of two children who are now adults and married. She lives with her daughter who is 30 years old and has two children, ages 6 and 3. With work and effort Consuelo has been able to build her own house. 

She works selling small animals, which she has been doing for 10 years. She learned this business thanks to her mother who also makes her living this way.

This is the second loan that Consuelo is requesting and she likes the program because she does not need to fill out much paperwork in order to receive a loan. Her new loan will go towards buying a few cattle for her business. Her goal is to have more livestock to sell and thereby grow her business much more.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, 44 años, es  una madre de familia muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su esposo  y sus hijos. La librería que posee María, es una de las más atractivas y concurridas de su barrio, negocio que se encuentra situada en el primer ambiente de su casa. El gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida del barrio, de ahí que se preocupa en tenerla surtida de acuerdo a los requerimientos de sus clientes. Es por ello que sus vecinos no dudan en acudir a su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es lo que conversa con sus clientes y que además le es muy rentable, Lleva muchos años en esta labor y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer de pie, ya que tiene problemas de varices. En adelante, desea ampliar las instalaciones de su librería. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su grupo comunal, donde es muy respetado  por el resto de sus clientes. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará accesorios de oficina, así Incrementará su stock de productos.
texts.en: María, 44years old, is the mother of an industrious family. She lives in her own home, accompanied by her husband and sons. María's book store is one of the most attractive and the busiest in her neighbourhood. She runs her business from the front room of her house. Her great charisma and friendliness in her business dealings have made her a favourite in her neighbourhood. As such she concerns herself with stocking an assortment of items in order to fulfil her clients' needs.  For this reason, her neighbours do not hesitate to return to her business.  Her favourite of her job is talking to her clients and the profit she is able to make from it. She has been running this business for many years and thinks that the hardest part is being on her feet for so long, as she already has problems with varicose veins. From this point on, she wishes to develop her book store's facilities. This is her 16th loan via MFP, and she knows that if she repays it on time, then she will be able to access another with greater peace of mind and without causing any complications for her communal group, in which she is well respected by the rest of its clients. With this loan, she will purchase office accessories, so as to increase her range of products.

loans.use: Purchase of office items.

loans.name: Nancy Crisalia

texts.es:
La Señora. Nancy I. es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive en la comunidad que lleva el mismo nombre y pertenece a la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía, también tiene 4 ríos los mismos que  bañan a la ciudad.

Doña Nancy tiene 29 años, su esposo tiene 35 años y juntos tienen  4 hijos de 9, 8, 7 y 4 años de edad, sus tres primeros hijos estudian en una escuela de la ciudad, su esposo es maestro en el área de la construcción, viven en casa propia la misma que es de su esposo.

La Señora Nancy se dedica  a la venta bisutería  actividad que la realiza hace un tiempo atrás,  es ella quien compra los materiales para realizar pulseras, colgantes, collares, aretes, trabaja desde su casa y las vende a sus amigas, conocidas y también vende recorriendo la ciudad,  aprendido a realizar sus artesanías en un curso que realizo de bisutería y tejidos lo cual le ha servido para iniciar su propio negocio.

Es el segundo crédito que  realiza en el banco comunal y le gusta por la facilidad para obtener los créditos, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales para la realizar sus artesanías como son: mullos, perlas etc. Su sueño es tener su casa propia pero construida con su esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nancy I. is a member of the El Aguacate (The Avocado) communal bank.  She lives in the community of Avocado which is part of the city of Cuenca.  Cuenca is beautiful because of its culture and traditions.  It has a varied gastronomy and four rivers that bathe the city.

Nancy is 29 years old and her husband is 35.  They have four children together who are 9, 8, 7 and 4 years of age.  Her first three children go to a school in the city.  Her husband is a master builder and they live in their own house which is her husband’s.

Nancy has sold costume jewelry for some time now.  She buys the materials and makes bracelets, necklaces, pendants, earrings.  She works at home and sells to her friends and acquaintances and also travels through the city selling.  She learned how to make the crafts in a jewelry making course she took and this has helped her start her own business.

This is the 2nd loan she’s had with the communal bank.  She likes it because of the ease with which loans are obtained.  She will use the new loan to buy materials to make her crafts like: beads, pearls, etc.  Her dream is to have her own house but to build carefully.

loans.use: To buy pearls, beads, pins, etc.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca 57 años, es una madre de familia noble de un trato muy agradable, vive en compañía de su hija ya mayor, en su casa propia. Desde temprana edad ha incursionada en diversos trabajos, ya que su principal prioridad era sacar adelante a sus hijos. Hoy en día se dedica en la venta de productos de belleza, ofreciendo estos productos a sus familiares, amigas y vecinas de su barrio, negocio que le va muy bien. El  buen trato que tiene le ha dado ventaja para ganar clientes. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es recorrer las calles y conversar con sus clientes, puesto que así se mantiene en continua comunicación con ellos, además es bueno para su salud el caminar. En adelante, lo que más desea es comprarse vitrinas, para guardar y conservar sus productos en buen estado. Este es su 16avo crédito con MFP y se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, para no perjudicar la confianza depositada en ella; de los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más productos de belleza, para cumplir los diversos pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en: Francisca, 57 years old, is the mother of a noble and pleasant family. She lives with her grown-up daughter in their own home. Since an early age she has participated diverse types of work, as her main priority has been to care for her children.  These days she sells beauty products to her relatives, friends and neighbours: a business which is going well for her. The good treatment that she offers has enabled her to win new clients. Her favourite part of her work is travelling through the streets and talking to her clients, as this allows her to maintain ongoing communication with them, as well as which the walking is good for her health. Furthermore, she really wants to purchase glass cabinets for storing and keeping her products in a good condition. This is her 16th loan via MFP and she is committed to making repayments in a timely fashion, so as not to damage the trust that has been placed in her by the members of her communal bank. With this loan, she will buy more beauty products in order to fulfil her clients' different requests.

loans.use: To stock beauty products

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras De Micaela Bastida Group

texts.es: La alcancía comunal llamada Mujeres Emprendedoras D. Micaela Bastida, es un grupo conformado por 10 mujeres  luchadoras y con buenas ideas para los negocios  hoy en día. Una D. las integrantes es Diana L. con una historia en particular D. éxito y progreso, Diana tiene 45 años D. edad y madre soltera D. un hijo que ha sabido sacarlo adelante con el esfuerzo D. un pequeño negocio que puso hace ya 10 años el cual es el negocio D. fotocopias que fue muy rentable en la zona en la que vive ya que por ahí no avía una. D. esta manera a sabido sobresalir siempre para adelante. Con el fruto del negocio D. fotocopias a podido darle una vida digna a su hijo y una economía estable para su hogar. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertirlo en implementos para las maquinas fotocopiadoras. Como la señora Diana L. cada integrante tiene una historia en particular pero si en algo coinciden es en el empeño que ponen, ante cada desafío que les presenta la vida, en lucha por el bienestar D. sus familias y sus mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Mujeres Emprendedoras D. Micaela Bastida" - or Micaela Bastida's Enterprising Women. The group is composed of 10 determined women with good ideas for their existing businesses. 

One of the members is Diana L., who has a personal history of progress and success. Diana is 45 years old, and the single mother of a son. She has been able to bring him up thanks to a small and very profitable photocopying business she set up 10 years ago in her home neighbourhood, where there wasn't any comparable service. With the profits from the business she has been able to give her son a good upbringing and bring a stable income into her home. With the loan she is planning to invest in implements for the photocopying machines. 

Like Diana L., each member of the group has her own story, but what they have in common is in their determination, in the face of whatever life throws at them, to fight for the wellbeing of their families and improve their economic situations.

loans.use: To invest in implements for photocopiers

loans.name: Mabel Esther

texts.es: Mabel Rodríguez  tiene 46 años y vende ropa elegante para damas y niñas, en su negocio variedades Luca,  lo cual hace al por mayor y detal. Ella es casada y con dos hijos en las edades de 18 y 21 años de edad , se dedicó al negocio desde muy joven cuando llegó a Barranquilla con la ilusión de cursar estudios superiores , pero como no tenia como pagarlos decidió trabajar en almacenes de ropa, donde adquirió su experiencia, y una vez nació su primer hijo se retiró del trabajo como empleada y con la liquidación de sus prestaciones sociales, emprendió su sueño de ser empresaria, que fortaleció con financiamientos por parte de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que logró ampliar su infraestructura física, y  tener mayores inventarios con los que ha conseguido incrementar el numero de clientes. Ella cuenta que en el año 1992 dio inicio a su negocio, pero como invirtió en la  compra   del local y en dos vitrinas, se quedó sin capital para surtir, así fue como acudió  a su cuñada quien como operaria de una fabrica de ropas la apoyó, así Mabel compraba telas e insumos y ella fabricaba de acuerdo a los diseños que  esta última proponía. En  el año 1996, acudió en un grupo solidario a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización que desde ese momento  le ha dado la mano, ella inició con $300.000 COP y hoy está aplicando a un crédito de $1.400.000 COP, por la línea de  credikiva, que es  el octavo financiamiento que hace a esta organización; con él comprará un computador portátil para el registro financiero y el control administrativo de su microempresa, que en la actualidad está muy bien estructurada y con éste equipo mejorará los tiempos de control. Mabel Rodríguez se siente una mujer muy exitosa y esto lo ha logrado con el apoyo de su familia y su gran capacidad de resistirse ante las adversidades trabajando de buena fe; así ha conseguido aumentar la calidad de vida de su familia y fortalecer su espíritu libre e independiente y auto sostenible. Su sueño es tener una sucursal que fortalezca la rotación de inventarios y aumente sus utilidades. Mabel cuenta que en su negocio le ha tocado ingeniárselas, para que las nuevas tendencias de la moda no la dejen por fuera del mercado, porque sus estilos son clásicos y gustan a un perfil especial de mujeres y niñas en las fiestas especiales como grados primeras cominuiones y eventos muy formales .
texts.en: Mabel Rodríguez is 46 years old and sells elegant clothing for women and girls in her varieties shop, Luca, at wholesale and retail prices. She is married and has two children aged 18 and 21 years old.  She has been in business since a young age when she arrived in Barranquilla with the dream of completing Higher education studies, but as she was unable to pay for them she decided to work in a clothing department store where she gained her experience.  Once her first child was born she left her job and, using her social security benefits, she fulfilled her dream of being a businesswoman. She strengthened her business with financing from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organisation which allowed her to extend her physical infrastructure and increase her stock levels, and so increase her client base. She tells us that when she started her business in 1992, she had no capital to supply as she had invested it in buying the shop and two glass cabinets, so she went to her sister-in-law who worked as a machine operator in a clothing factory. Mabel bought materials and supplies and worked according to the designs suggested by her sister-in-law. In 1996 she joined the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo group, an organisation which has lent her a hand ever since. She started out with $300,000 COP and today she is applying for a loan of $1,400,000 COP, via Kiva, which is the eighth loan that she will have had from this organisation. With the loan she will purchase a laptop computer to record her finances and manage the administration of her small business, which is already well structured and with this piece of equipment she will improve the way that she manages her time. Mabel Rodríguez feels that she is a very successful woman and has achieved this with the support of her family, and due to her capacity for resistance when faced with adversities while working in good faith. This has allowed her to improve the quality of her family's life and strengthen her free, independent and self-sufficient spirit.  Her dream is to have an office to build her stock rotation and increase her profits.  Mabel says that her business has taught her to manage her profits so that new trends in fashion do not put her out of business, because her classic styles appeal to a special type of women and girls attending special parties such as first grade communions and very formal events.

loans.use: To buy a laptop computer to record her finances and manage the administration of her small business.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es socia del Banco Comunal “Azangarinas al Progreso”  ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad.  Es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos.  Realizó estudios de educación superior pero no los concluyó.

Viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos desde hace 01 año, su   primer préstamo  fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  utilizó para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de carne de ganado vacuno, queso y pan.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 2500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  invertirá en su mercadería, comprará carnes y harina para hacer pan.

Su sueño para el futuro  es hacer arreglar su casa y aumentar su mercadería para generar mayores ganancias.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las ganancias de sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Gloria is a member of the Communal Bank, "Azangarinas al Progreso", located in Azángaro district, in the province of Azángaro, in the Puno department. She is 30 years old and lives with her partner and 3 children.  She began her Higher education but she did not finish it.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 1 year. Her first loan was for S/.300,00 Nuevos Soles. The money was used to increase her business capital, she sells meat and cattle, cheese and bread.

Gloria is applying for a new loan of S/.2500,00 Nuevos Soles, which she will invest in merchandise; she will buy meats and flour to make bread.

Her dream for the future is make repairs on her home and increase her stock in order to generate greater profits.

Her favourite thing about her Communal Bank is the return that she gets on her savings.

loans.use: To purchase meat and flour to make bread.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel es un padre de familia dde 40 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el sector Laguna Grande, una zona agrícola del distrito de Santa Rosa, el cual de encuentra ubicado a más de 25 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de diez años a trabajar en la crianza y venta de animales, el cuenta con algunas vacas de las cuales comercializa a diario la leche que producen entre los vecinos de la zona, también cuenta con cerdos y aves de corral las cuales comercializa entre los negociantes de la zona. Paralelamente se dedica a la venta de chatarra. Con estos negocios el se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia y de solventar su economía diaria.

Manuel desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la producción de sus animales y percibir mayores ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1800 nuevos soles.

El es un padre que siempre vela por el bienestar y desarrollo de su familia. Su mayor anhelo es verlos progresar y gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel is a 40 year old father who lives with his wife and children in the Laguna Grande area, a farming area in the Santa Rosa district, which is located more than 25 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

For more than 10 years he has worked as an animal breeder and seller. He has cows which he uses as part of a dairy business, selling the milk they produce to his area neighbours. He also has pigs and free-range birds which he markets among local businesses. At the same time he sells scrap metal. With these businesses he is in charge of providing for his family and settling his dairy business.

Manuel wishes to buy well-balanced feed to improve his animal products and to receive greater profits, so he thought it wise to apply for a loan of 1800 Nuevos Soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

He is a father who always looks out for his family's well being and development. His greatest desire is to see them progress and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: To acquire well-balanced feed to improve his animal products and to receive greater profits.

loans.name: Martha Braulia

texts.es:
La Señora. Martha C. es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive en la comunidad que lleva el mismo nombre y  pertenece a la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su cultura y tradiciones, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía, también tiene 4 ríos los mismos que bañan la ciudad.

Nuestra socia labora junto a su esposo en un taller de joyería, actividad que desempeñan hace varios años. También se dedica a la venta de cerdos, negocio que lo aprendido de sus padres y ahora tiene mucha experiencia en este trabajo, le gusta este trabajo ya que le da ganancias rápidas pero el problema es que debe tener un buen capital de trabajo para comprar sus cerdos.
 
La Señora. Martha tiene 33 años y su esposo 37 años, tienen 2 hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familia pero independientes.
 
Se encuentra hace un año y cuatro meses en el banco comunal y le gusta los créditos ya que son rápidos y sin muchos papeleos. El dinero de su  crédito lo va a invertir la mitad en el negocio de las joyas y la otra mitad en la compra de cerdos. Su meta es tener un gabinete de belleza.
texts.en: Martha C. is a member of El Aguacate (Avocado) community bank and lives in the community of the same name in the city of Cuenca. This city has a beautiful culture and tradition and is known for its great variety of gastronomy as well as having four rivers running through it. Martha works alongside her husband at their jewelry shop, an activity they have been doing for a number of years. She also makes a living selling pigs, a business she learned from her parents in which she now has a lot of experience. She enjoys the job because it earns income quickly, but the problem is it takes a lot of capital to buy the pigs at the start. Martha is 33 years old and her husband is 37. They have two children, ages 8 and 2. They don't own a home but live in a family member's home independently. Martha has been a member of her community bank for a year and four months and enjoys the loans since they are quick and don't have a lot of red tape. She plans on using half of the loan for her jewelry business and the other half to buy pigs. Her goal is to have a beauty shop.

loans.use: Purchase jewelry and pigs

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia tiene 41 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo e hijos. La tienda  que posee es una de las más concurridas de su distrito, negocio que se encuentra ubicado en el primer ambiente de su casa, es ahí, donde atiende con amabilidad y alegría a todos sus clientes. Por tal motivo su bodega es la más concurrida y preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras. Lo que más le gusta de su negocio es que le es muy rentable, además puede disponer de su horario para la atención hacía sus clientes, y para su hogar, en donde sus hijos la necesitan, ya que están en etapa escolar. En adelante, piensa asegurar la puerta de su tienda con otra puerta adicional de rejas, debido a los constantes robo que se suscitan dentro de su zona, además tiene el anhelo de ampliar su negocio. Este es su 16avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo y esta dispuesta hacerlo, ya que no quiere perjudicar a su grupo comunal, donde se siente muy querida. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mercadería perecible, para seguir abasteciendo su bodega.
texts.en:
Virginia is 41 years old.  She is an unassuming and hard-working woman who lives in her own home with her husband and children.  Her store is one of the busiest in the district.  It is located in the front of her home.  There, she serves all her customers with kindness and happiness.  For this reason, her store is the busiest and most popular amongst her neighbors who don't hesitate to do their shopping there.  What Virginia most likes about her business is that it is very profitable.  Also, she can decide on when she's open to serve her customers and be at home where her children need her since they are still at school.

In the future, Virginia would like to secure the door of her store with an additional door made from iron bars because there have been constant robberies in her area.  She would also like to expand her business.

This is Virginia's 16th loan cycle with MFP.  She knows that she has to make all of her repayments on time and she is ready to do this since she doesn't want to inconvenience her community bank where she feels very well liked.  She will use her loan to buy perishables to stock her store with.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (perishables) to stock her store with

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su familia en el caserío Huaca Partida del distrito de Pítipo, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia de Ferreñafe y que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores desde hace diez años, el cría ovejas y aves de corral al aire libre, los compra a sus vecinos y los alimenta para luego ofrecerlos en venta al público en general en los mercados de la provincia de Ferreñafe. El negocio le brinda algunos ingresos que utiliza para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de la economía diaria.

Carlos desea adquirir más animales para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, con esta ampliación el podrá ampliar sus ventas por temporada navideña, que es cuando la demanda aumenta. Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Carlos es una persona bastante responsable y emprendedora. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para ayudar a su familia a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 30 years old.  He is single and lives with his family in Huanca Partida village, in Pítipo district.  This is an agricultural area in Ferreñafe province, twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Carlos has been raising and selling young animals for ten years.  He raises sheep and poultry in the open air.  He buys them from neighbors then fattens them up and offers them for sale to the general public in Ferreñafe province's markets.  The business makes him income which he uses to cover his personal expenses and to support his family with their daily finances.

Carlos would like to acquire more animals to expand his business and make more profits.  He hopes that with this expansion he can increase his sales for the Christmas period which is when demand rises.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Carlos is quite a responsible and enterprising person.  His biggest wish is to continue growing as a businessman so that he can help his family improve their quality of life.

loans.use: To acquire more animals to expand his business

loans.name: Rosario Emperatriz

texts.es:
Rosario es una madre de familia de 40 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito de Pacasmayo, una zona comercial que pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre y se encuentra situada en la región La Libertad, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales. Ella cría vacas y aves de corral como pavos y gallinas. En cuanto a las vacas comercializa la leche que estas producen y a las aves de corral las ofrece en venta una vez que hayan alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo. Sus ventas las realiza en el principal mercado de la ciudad.

Rosario desea ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ingresos en su negocio, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer bastante entregada a su familia y que siempre se encuentra buscando el modo de sacarlos adelante. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Rosario is a 40 year old mother who lives with her husband and children in Pacasmayo district, a commercial district which is in the province of the same name, in La Libertad region, more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Rosario raises and sells animals.  She raises cows and poultry such as turkeys and hens.  As far as the cows are concerned, she sells the milk which they produce.  She offers her poultry for sale once they have reached a good level of development.  She makes her sales in the town's main market.

Rosario would like to expand her sales and make more income in her business.  For that reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Rosario is a woman who is committed to her family and who is always looking for ways to get them ahead in life.  People who know her like her and have a lot of respect for her.

loans.use: To increase her sales

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es: Hugo, de 37 años, convive con Encarnación de 25 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Yelsi, de 14, Nicol, de 12 y Paola, de 4 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio el palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo que realiza, Hugo es la siembra de café y plátano, ya tiene 7 años dedicándose a ello, y según afirma lo que más le gusta a él es poder limpiar su terreno agrícola, “me divierte, quitar la maleza de la tierra”, menciona. Cada 15 días viaja a la ciudad de La Merced, donde vende los plátanos que cosecha, pero su producción de café, los vende a los acopiadores que constantemente visitan sus cultivos. A Hugo le falta capital, para mejorar la calidad de sus plantaciones, por ello más adelante quiere abrir un negocio de comestibles en su comunidad, con el que piensa generar nuevos ingresos y así invertir en la agricultura. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, y le agrada el trabajo que desarrolla junto a su banco comunal, pues en este corto tiempo pudo lograr mejoras en sus cultivos. De adquirir el crédito solicitado tiene pensado comprar 13 sacos de abono orgánico, para sus plantaciones de café, que en esto meses cosechará.
texts.en:
Hugo is 37 years old.  He lives with 25 year-old Encarnación and they have 3 children: 14 year-old Yelsi, 12 year-old Nicol and 4 year-old Paola.  They live together in their own home in the community of Sanchirio el Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).

Hugo's work is growing coffee and bananas.  He has been in this business for 7 years and he says that what he most likes is cleaning his farm lands. “I enjoy getting rid of the weeds”, he says.  Every 15 days, Hugo travels to the city of La Merced where he sells the bananas which he harvests.  However, he sells his coffee production to traders who constantly visit his crops.

Hugo lacks capital to improve the quality of his plantations.  In the future, he would like to open a food business in his community to make more income and thereby be able to invest in his farming.

This is Hugo's third loan from MFP and he likes the work that he does together with his community bank because in this short period of time he has managed to achieve improvements in his crops.  He will use his loan to buy 13 sacks of organic fertilizer for his coffee plantations which he will harvest in the coming months.

loans.use: To buy 13 sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Bertha

texts.es:
María Bertha es una madre de familia de 39 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el Anexo San Luis, una zona agrícola que pertenece al distrito de La Victoria, una de las zonas mas pobladas de la provincia de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores. Ella suele criar aves de corral y las vende sacrificadas semanalmente entre sus vecinos y los pobladores del distrito que van hacia el mercado. El negocio le sirve para apoyar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. 

María desea realizar algunos arreglos en su domicilio de modo que ella y su familia puedan vivir de mejor modo, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles. 

María es una mujer entregada a su familia y que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
María Bertha is a 39 year-old mother who lives with her husband and three children in San Luis, an agricultural area of La Victoria district, one of the most densely-populated districts of Chiclayo province.

María raises and sells young animals.  She usually raises poultry and then every week she sells them, already slaughtered, to her neighbors and residents of the district who come to the market.  Her business helps her to support her husband with the family's finances.

María would like to carry out some home repairs so that she and her family can live better.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

María is a woman who is committed to her family and who has a great desire to get ahead in life.  People who know her consider her to be a responsible and trustworthy woman.

loans.use: To carry out some home repairs

loans.name: Maximina

texts.es:
Maximina es una madre D. familia D. 53 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el caserío Santa Isabel, una zona rural que se encuentra situada en el distrito D. Mórrope, un distrito agrícoL. D. regular movimiento comercial que pertenece a L. provincia D. Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a más D. una hora D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica a L. crianza y venta D. animales. ElL. cría pollos, pavos, cuyes chivos y cerdos en L. parte posterior D. su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta quincenalmente en el mercado Moshoqueque D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo. El negocio es D. mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento D. L. economía D. su familia, su esposo trabaja como jornalero en los campos D. cultivo D. L. zona y juntos tratan D. salir adelante.

Maximina desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo mas animales y alimento, elL. desea prepararse para L. temporada naviD.ña que es cuando sus ventas aumentan, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta.

ElL. es una mujer emprendedora y que tiene muchas ganas D. progresar, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Maximina is a 53-year-old mother who lives together with her husband and children in Santa Isabel, a rural zone in the Mórrope district. It is an agricultural area which also has steady commercial activity. It belongs to Lambayeque province and is located more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Her work is raising and selling animals. She raises chickens, turkeys, guinea pigs, goats and pigs in the back yard of her house. When the animals have reached a good stage of development, she offers them for sale every two weeks at the Moshoqueque market in the city of Chiclayo. Her business is of great help in supporting her family's economic needs; her husband works as a day laborer in the agricultural fields of the area, and together they are trying to get ahead in life. 

Maximina wants to expand her business by acquiring more animals and feed. She would like to prepare for the Christmas season, when her sales increase. For this reason, she decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 Peruvian new soles, which will help her achieve her goal. 

She is an enterprising woman with a great desire to make progress. People who know her have great esteem and respect for her.

loans.use: Acquiring more animals and feed for the Christmas season

loans.name: Veronica Elvira

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el distrito de Lambayeque, una zona de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de tipeos, impresiones y búsqueda de información en un local situado frente a una universidad que se encuentra en el lugar. Esta actividad es una de las más comunes en la zona debido a la gran cantidad de estudiantes que se encuentran en la ciudad. Su trabajo consiste en tipear sus trabajos, imprimirlos y muchas veces buscar información adicional. Esta actividad es muy rentable.

Verónica desea brindar mantenimiento a su computadora de modo que esta pueda operar de modo rápido, lo cual generará que la calidad de su atención mejore, adicionalmente desea adquirir material para realizar su labor, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 600 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una joven bastante emprendedora y que busca salir adelante, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien bastante amable y responsable.
texts.en:
Verónica is 28 years old.  She is single and lives together with her parents in Lambayeque district, an area with a lot of commercial activity which is 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Verónica provides typing, printing and information searching services in a premises located opposite a university.  This business activity is one of the most common in the area owing to the large number of students in the city.  She types up students' work, prints it out and often also searches for additional information.  This activity is very profitable.

Verónica would like to have her computer serviced so that it will work quickly which will improve the quality of her service.  She would also like to acquire materials to carry out her work.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 600 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help her to achieve her goal.

Verónica is quite an enterprising young woman who is looking for ways to get ahead in life.  People who know her consider her to be quite kind and responsible.

loans.use: To have her computer serviced

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo, de 24 años, es un valeroso hombre soltero, tiene 2 hijos: Yero, de 5 y Alexis, de 3 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Sanchirio del Palomar (selva central peruana). Este joven y responsable padre de familia, trabaja arduamente en sus terrenos agrícolas, su principal producción consta de plátanos y café. Los que según menciona, hace ya 2 años, que viene generándole buenos ingresos, pues sus cultivos en campañas agrícolas son los mejores de la zona, logro que consiguió a base de capacitaciones para conseguir un buen grano de café. Mientras que sus frutos de plátanos, le proporcionan estabilidad, ya que cada 15 días, después de su cosecha los comercializa en el mercado central de su ciudad. Por ello más adelante desea comprar más terrenos agrícolas, en las que pueda aplicar todo lo que aprendió. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, y espera seguir saliendo adelante junto a su banco comunal. De adquirir el crédito solicitado tiene pensado comprar 20 sacos de abono orgánico, y 2 mil plantas de café, para hacer su vivero con los que renovará sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 24 years old.  He is a courageous single man who has two children: 5 year-old Yero and 3 year-old Alexis.  They live together in their own home in the community of Sanchirio del Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).  This young and responsible father works hard on his land.  His main crops are bananas and coffee.  He mentions that they have been making a good profit for two years since his crops, during the agricultural seasons, are the best in the area.

With training, Ricardo has managed to achieve good coffee beans, while his bananas provide him with stability as he harvests them every 15 days and then sells them in the town's central market.  For this reason, in the future he would like to buy more land to which he can apply everything that he has learned.

This is Ricardo's second loan with MFP and he hopes to continue getting ahead in life together with his community bank.  He will use his loan to buy 20 sacks of organic fertilizer and 2,000 coffee plants for his nursery.  He will use them to renew his plantation crops.

loans.use: To buy 20 sacks of fertilizer and 2,000 coffee plants

loans.name: Felix Juan

texts.es:
Felix tiene 24 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos, reside junto a su familia en el sector Yencala Boggiano de distrito de Lambayeque, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial. La zona se encuentra ubicada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la crianza y venta de animales menores, el cría aves de corral y ovejas en la parte posterior de su domicilio, las engorda para luego venderlas a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona y al público en general. Adicionalmente trabaja como jornalero en los campos de cultivo de la zona.

Felix desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales, alimentos y mejoras en su corral, ya que se acercan las fiestas navideñas y durante este tiempo sus ventas aumentan. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su meta.

Felix es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es seguir trabajando para el bienestar y mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Felix is 24 years old.  He is married and has two children.  He lives together with  his family in Yencala Boggiano sector of Lambayeque district.  This is an agricultural area with a lot of commercial activity.  The area is half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Felix has been raising and selling young animals for five years.  He raises poultry and sheep behind his home.  He fattens them to sell to the traders who usually visit the area and the general public.  He also works as a day laborer on farms in the area.

Felix would like to expand his business by buying more animals, feed and making improvements in his pens since the Christmas holiday period is approaching and his sales increase during this period.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help him achieve his goal.

Felix is quite a quiet and responsible person.  His biggest wish is to continue working for the well-being of his family and also to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To expand his business by buying more animals and feed and making improvements to his pens

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una madre D. familia D. 58 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en la ciudad D. Lambayeque, una zona D. regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización D. verduras en un puesto D. venta ubicado en el mercado modelo D. la ciudad. Ella ofrece sus productos diariamente y los adquiere en el mercado mayorista D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo. Debido al tiempo que lleva en el negocio y al buen trato que brinda, ella cuenta con un grupo D. clientes fieles.

Julia desea ampliar su negocio con la compra D. más verduras D. modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda que actualmente cuenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su objetivo.

Julia es una mujer amable y con muchas ganas D. superación, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto
texts.en:
Julia is a 58-year-old mother who lives together with her husband and children in the city of Lambayeque, a commercial area located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. 

She sells vegetables from a stand located in the central market of the city. She offers her products daily and obtains them from the wholesale market in Chiclayo. Due to the good customer service she has provided for so long, she has created a loyal customer base. 

Julia wishes to expand her business with the purchase of more vegetables in order to satisfy current customer demand, so with Edpyme Alternativa she has requested a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to achieve her goal. 

Julia is a nice woman who is eager to overcome problems and those who know her have a lot of respect for her.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables in order to satisfy business demand

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a sus padres y hermanos en el caserío Huertas Martínez del distrito de Lambayeque, una zona de movimiento comercial considerable que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado que consiste en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina en donde se puede brindar servicio de transporte) el brinda este servicio en las diversas calles del distrito de Lambayeque y con el dinero que gana se encarga de solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Roberto desea brindar mantenimiento al vehículo que maneja ya que el contínuo uso ha hecho que empiece a sufrir algunas fallas que dificultan su correcto funcionamiento, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

El es un joven bastante responsable y de carácter servicial, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien tranquilo y de confianza.
texts.en:
Roberto is 22 years old, is single and lives together with her parents and siblings in the village of Huertas Martínez in the Lambayeque district, a commercial zone located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. 

He provides transportation in a rickshaw (a motorized vehicle consisting of a motorcycle with an attached cabin for his passengers). He provides this service for various streets in the Lambayeque district and with his earnings he covers his personal expenses and helps his family with household costs. 

Roberto wishes to obtain maintenance for his rickshaw, since he continues to experience several defects that have made it difficult to run correctly. He has requested a loan with Edpyme Alternativa for 1200 nuevos soles. 

He is a very responsible and service-minded young man, and those who know him consider him a reliable and peaceful person.

loans.use: vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Esy

texts.es:
Esy es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en una zona urbano marginal de la ciudad de Lambayeque, una ciudad ubicada a veinte minutos de Chiclayo y que cuenta con bastante movimiento comercial.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos cosméticos por catálogo. Trabaja en base a pedidos y sus clientes son sus vecinos y conocidos, siempre está a la búsqueda de nuevos clientes ya que mientras más pedidos coloque, más ganancias obtiene por parte de la compañía que le abastece de productos. Los ingresos que ella percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía de su familia.

Esy desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda contar con un inventario estable que le permita satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes cuando ellos lo necesiten sin tener que esperar a fin de mes, que es cuando llega el pedido, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Esy is a 30 year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in a marginal urban area of the city of Lambayeque, a city which is located 20 minutes from Chiclayo and has quite a lot of commercial activity.

Esy sells cosmetics through a catalog.  Her customers, who are her neighbors and acquaintances, place orders with her.  She is always on the look out for new customers since the more orders she places, the more profits she makes from the company who supply the products.  The income which she makes from this activity are used to help her husband with the family's finances.

Esy would like to expand her business by purchasing more products so that she can have a stable inventory which will allow her to satisfy her customers' demands when they want their products without having to wait until the end of the month which is when her orders arrive.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Esy is a quiet and responsible woman.  Her greatest wish is to continue growing as a businesswoman so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To expand her business by purchasing more products

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José Santos tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Olmos, caracterizado por tener a la mayor parte de su población concentrada en zonas rurales, pertenece a la ciudad de Lambayeque y queda ubicada a una hora y cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

El cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado que consiste en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina en donde se puede brindar servicio de transporte) con la que actualmente trabaja brindando servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en la ciudad de Olmos y sus caseríos, esta actividad tiene bastante acogida en la zona ya que este medio de transporte es muy utilizado por los pobladores para transportarse a sus domicilios que muchas veces quedan ubicados a varios kilometros de Olmos.

José Santos ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a brindar mantenimiento a su unidad móvil así como adquirir algunos accesorios para la misma. El ya ha trabajo anteriormente con un préstamo financiado a través del fondo Kiva y gracias a ese préstamo pudo realizar algunas reparaciones a su vehículo.

Jose Santos es un joven responsable y trabajador, con los ingresos que percibe ayuda a sus padres a sostener la economía de su hogar, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario y adquirir mas mototaxis. El se encuentra bastante agradecido con las personas que han colaborado con el a través del fondo Kiva.
texts.en:
José Santos is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the Olmos district, where the majority of the population is concentrated in rural zones. This is part of Lambayeque city and it is located one hour and forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

He drives a mototaxi (a motorized vehicle that consists of a motorcycle with a cabin attached, where transport services are carried out) with which he provides cargo and passenger transport services in the city of Olmos and the surrounding areas.

This service is very welcomed in the region since the people often use mototaxis to get to their residences, often located many kilometers from Olmos. 

José Santos has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 soles to help him with the maintenance of his mototaxi and to purchase accessories for it. 

He has previously taken out a loan financed by Kiva funds, and thanks to that loan he was able to make repairs to his vehicle.  

Jose Santos is a responsible and hard-working young person. He uses his income to help his parents to sustain the household. His greatest wish is to continue growing as a businessman and to purchase M. mototaxis. 

He is very thankful for the people that have chipped in to his loan with Kiva funds.

loans.use: For the maintenance of his mototaxi and the purchase of accessories for it.

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Jesus María es una madre de familia de 45 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a más de una hora y cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde a la comercialización de artículos diversos como juguetes, portaretratos, perfumes y diversos artículos de decoración en un establecimiento ubicado en su domicilio. El negocio tiene varios años de funcionamiento y debido a ello es bastante conocido en la zona. Con los ingresos que percibe de este negocio se encarga de ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía de su familia.

Jesús María desea adquirir más mercadería para poder ampliar su negocio y responder a la demanda que por temporada navideña suele aumentar, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer responsable y bastante entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Jesus María is the mother of a family, 45 years of age, who lives with her husband and children in the Olmos district, an agricultural area of regular commercial activity that belongs to the province of Lambayeque, located over an hour and forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  

She is dedicated to the sale of diverse articles such as toys, portraits, perfumes and decorative items in an establishment located in her residence.  The business has been in operation for several years and due to this is well known in the area.  With the income that she earns from this business she takes charge of helping her husband to settle the family expenses.  

Jesus María desires to acquire more merchandise to be able to expand her business and to respond to the increased demand during the Christmas season. Because of this she has found it convenient to request a loan of 500 new soles from Edpyme Alternative.  

She is an responsible woman and devoted to her family.  Her greatest desire is to continue growing as a businesswoman to be able to help her family get ahead.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Noelina

texts.es:
Noelina es una madre de familia de 29 años de edad que tiene un hijo menor de edad y que reside en el distrito agrícola de Nueva Arica, una zona ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en su domicilio. Ella vende prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños entre sus vecinos y conocidos de la zona. El negocio es su única fuente de ingreso por lo que siempre da lo mejor de si para sacarlo adelante. Debido al tiempo que lleva en el negocio (10 años) actualmente cuenta con una clientela fidelizada.

Noelina desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda que aumenta durante estas temporadas navideñas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer luchadora y que siempre da lo mejor de si para sacar adelante a su menor hijo, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien alegre y que siempre ayuda cuando se le necesita.
texts.en:
Noelina is a 29 year old mother with a young son. She lives in the farming district of Nueva Arica, an area situated an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

From her home she sells items of clothing for women, men and children, and she sells them to her neighbours and people that she knows in her area.  The business is her only source of income so she always tries her best to ensure that it works out. She has a very loyal client base as she has been running this business for 10 years.

Noelina wishes to expand her business by buying more fashion items in order to satisfy the increase in demand over the Christmas period. As such, she thought it wise to apply for a loan of 2000 Nuevos Soles from Edpyme Alternativa that will help her achieve her objective.

She is a strong woman who always does the best that she can to care for her young son. People who know her consider her to be a happy person who always helps others whenever there is need to do so.

loans.use: To buy more fashion items to satisfy the increase in demand during this Christmas period.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.en:
Guadalupe is 38 years old. She lives in the village of Locute in the district of Tambogrande. It is primarily a rural area with many small fruit farms and individuals who raise animals. Guadalupe lives with her husband and their three children in a home they own.

Guadalupe raises animals in the yard behind their home. She raises pigs, chickens, and ducks. These are all animals that can be raised in relatively small spaces within corrals. Guadalupe's husband owns a small plot of land on which he raises vegetables. He sells the vegetables himself in the local markets at retail prices.

The requested loan will be invested in additional feed for the animals. Guadalupe hopes to be able to fatten her animals up a bit more before the holiday season in order to take advantage of the better prices during the season. She has a good credit history and is well-respected in the community. Her primary goal is to provide greater opportunities and an education for her children.

loans.use: Additional feed for the animals

loans.name: Leo

texts.en:
Leo A. is from the city of Pob.1 Oroquieta City. He is 63 years old. Leo is married and has three adult children. Leo owns a business in the agriculture sector raising crops which primarily consist of cultivating fruit trees and harvesting their fruit for sale. Leo has been engaged in his business for over 10 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month.

In 2010, Leo joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Leo is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Leo from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve his business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla A. is from the village of Tuburan, Villaflor. She is 54 years old. Perla is married and has three adult-aged children. To make a living, Perla owns and operates a specialized retail store. The store's main source of income comes from the sale of daily-use products such as canned goods, noodles, milk, coffee, shampoo, soap, and toothpaste to the local community. Perla has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 1500 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2007, Perla joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Perla has successfully repaid a previous loan of 9000 PHP from GDMPC. Perla is requesting a new loan of 15000 PHP, which she will invest in expanding her business. This will be Perla's twelfth loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand the borrower's business. 

About GDMPC:
GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte, and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk, and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to invest in expanding her store

loans.name: Pablia

texts.en:
Mrs. Pablia D. is from the village of Dimaluna, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is 49 years old and is married to Edilberto who manages their business. They were blessed with 5 children who are now of school age. She is presently engaged in a coco lumber business. She has been working in this kind of business for 14 years and earns approximately 20,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, she joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 14,900 from PMPC. Pablia is requesting a loan of 50,000 PHP which will be used to purchase a band saw mill. This loan will be her fourth from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family and to cover future emergencies.



About PMPC: 
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.


*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy a band saw mill

loans.name: Marlon

texts.en:
Marlon B. is from the village of Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is 31 years old. Marlon is married and has an infant. To make a living, Marlon owns and operates a business which provides transportation services.  Marlon has been engaged in his business for over four years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Marlon joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Marlon is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This will be Marlon's first loan from GDMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand his business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte, and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks, and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina B. is from the village of Potol. She is 57 years old, married and has 4 adult children. Marcelina operates a family member's business in the food sector, making & selling snacks & other delicacies in the local community. She has been engaged in this business for over 10 years and earns approximately 4,500 PHP a month.

In 2008, Marcelina joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 9,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. Marcelina is requesting a new loan of 14,900 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell and to pay her son's tuition fees. This will be the 8th loan taken out by Marcelina from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma C. is from the village of Banigan, Liloy, Zamboanga Del Norte. She is 42 years old, married and has 4 school-aged children. Elma owns & operates an agricultural equipment business, selling general farm supplies & equipment to local farmers. She has been engaged in her business for over 15 years and earns approximately 26,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, Elma joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Elma has successfully repaid a previous loan of 20,000 PHP from PMPC. She is requesting a new loan of 30,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional equipment to sell. This will be the 5th loan taken out by Elma from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional agricultural equipment to sell

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.en:
Rodrigo D. is from the village of Baybay, Liloy, Zamboanga Del Norte. He is 56 years old, married and has 3 school-aged children. Rodrigo owns & operates a general store where he sells a variety of products. He has been engaged in his business for over 10 years and earns approximately 20,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, Rodrigo joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and his ability to engage in business activities. Rodrigo is requesting a new loan of 50,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand his product range. This will be his 1st loan from PMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand his business. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand his product range

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel A. is from the village of Lopoc, Labason, Zamboang Del Norte. She is 33 years old, married and has 4 school-aged children. Maricel owns & operates a specialized retail store where she sells daily use products such as shampoo, soap & toothpaste. She has been engaged in her business for over 6 years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month.

In 2010, Maricel joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This will be her 1st loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Y

texts.en:
Y P. is a 52-year-old single mother who currently lives in the Dangkor District of Phnom Penh in Cambodia. Her husband died of senility years ago. She is the mother of four children. Two of her children are married, and the other two are single. She has a life partner who works in different jobs, and they have a regular salary per month.
Y P. is a housewife. She always works on daily activities such as caring for her children, making food, cleaning her house, and managing other property in her house. Besides working at home, Y P. buys animals from villagers, fattens them for a while, and then sells them for a profit. Since the animal-selling business is the main source of income for the family, Y P. has requested a loan as capital to buy an extra cow to sell.

loans.use: To buy an extra cow to sell

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer L. is from the village of Sinonoc, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 35 years old. Jenifer is married and has four school-aged children. To make a living, Jenifer owns and operates a handicraft business.  The main source of income of the business comes from selling paper bags in the local community. Jenifer has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 1,400 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Jenifer joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jenifer is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP, which will provide additional capital for her business. This will be Jenifer's first loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to improve/expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte, and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks, and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to provide additional capital for her business

loans.name: Mary Bethanie

texts.en:
Mary Bethanie S. is a married woman who lives in the village of Daan Banua in Kabankalan City in the province of Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating a tailoring business. Her husband Romel G. S., who is 40 years old, works as a driver to earn his living. They have three children, ages 8 to 13. All of their children are currently going to school.

Mary Bethanie joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2000, because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past six loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Mary Bethanie has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. texts.en:
Sewing clothes is the main part of 30-year-old Mrs. Un S.’s daily duty in the garment industry. Un S. started in her job in 2008 and has a formal salary. She has a life partner in her husband (pictured) who is a security guard. The couple helps each other to earn money to feed their two children, both of whom attend school. 

Un S. wants a plowing machine so she can provide a plowing service for other farmers who lives in and around her community. Because she needs money to buy one, Un S. is requesting a loan from Kiva. Un S. will use these funds to buy a plowing machine to begin providing her service.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita B. is from the village of Tapican in Liloy, Zamboanga Del Norte. She is 41 years old. Lolita is married and has 2 school-aged children. To make a living, Lolita owns and operates a specialized retail store where she sells daily-use products such as shampoo, soap & toothpaste in the local community. Lolita has been engaged in her business for over 7 years and earns approximately 10000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Lolita joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lolita has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to to invest in expanding the business. Lolita is requesting a new loan of 14800 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the 4th loan taken out by Lolita from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.

loans.name: Zayabayar

texts.en:
Mr. Zayabayar is 30 years old and lives with his wife Ariunaa and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They don’t have their own place to live and currently they are renting a one-bedroom apartment in the city. The two eldest daughters are attending a local secondary school and the youngest one is just two months old.

Mr. Zayabayar has been running a transportation business for the last 4 years. He used to rent a minivan and carry people on one of the suburban bus routes where there is always a lack of buses. In June 2010 he bought his old minivan and is still transporting people on the same route. Sometimes his wife helps in his business, working as a conductor.

This business is the only source of income for the family and currently, due to the coming winter, Mr. Zayabayar needs to do some good service on his minivan. Mongolian winter is very harsh, especially at night when it can drop to -40 degrees Celsius. The loan Mr. Zayabayar is requesting will be used to buy the necessary spare parts and materials to do a proper winter service on his minivan.

loans.use: to buy the necessary spare parts and materials to do a proper winter service on his minivan.

Lanie is now borrowing PHP 20000 to purchase more stocks to sell. This will be her 9th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. loans.name: Bayar

texts.en:
Bayar is 26 years old and lives with his wife and infant daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They don’t have their own house but they live in a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent on his parents' land. He has a second-hand microbus (people carrier or van) and got a contract with the transportation authority to carry people on remote bus routes. He has been running his transportation business since 2006.  His wife Solongo works with him as a cashier.

Bayar is a very hardworking and optimistic person whose goal is to extend his business and provide for the necessary expenses of his family.  He also wants to have his own plot of land and a house to live in.

Last year he took a loan from our institution to renew his minivan. This is his second Kiva loan through Credit Mongol and this time he is requesting a loan to purchase some spare parts to repair and service his vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase some spare parts to repair and service his vehicle.
